## Resources.IResourceDeclarationOptions.includeMetadata property

Whether to include metadata in compiled outputs. Metadata includes human-readable information like semantic keys that can be useful for debugging or tooling.

**Signature:**

```typescript
includeMetadata?: boolean;
```
